resources.string: 1. First set your location to be DEVICE ONLY (use only gps location).
2. Enable the DEVELOPER OPTIONS on your device (on older versions it is not needed).
3. To enable the DEVELOPER OPTIONS go to SETTINGS > ABOUT PHONE > and click on the BUILD NUMBER or ANDROID VERSION about 7 times.
4. A message: Your are developer now will appear.
5. New menu DEVELOPER OPTIONS will appear above ABOUT PHONE.
6. In the DEVELOPER OPTIONS, set mock location app for this app.
